channel.title: Vital RS | PvP & PvM | Looking for staff
channel.description:
Website: http://www.vitalrs.co.uk/
Game client: http://www.vitalrs.co.uk/play-now
-All T90 Weapons -Full GWD -Many Bosses ( KBD, QBD, Nex and custom bosses such as Hope Devourer, Pest Queen etc! -Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Super Donator, Extreme Donator, Spawn and Support! -Server Statistics quest tab -Home is great! -Pvp System (kill streak, Hiscore) with Pvp shop - Ganodermic lair & Dragon lair! - Working Auras - Full Dagganoths with RS drops! - Flaming skulls - Specs for all items the should have - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP and a Repair stand! - Auras are all complete - 100% Godwars Bosses - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Fast Switching - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar) - All special attacks working - Awesome donator zone - FULL RUNESPAN - 90% WARRIORS GUILD - All new 742 armours with bonuses - Working Duel arena - Falconry Hunter - Gnome advanced

item.title: Vital RS | PvP & PvM | Looking for staff

@briney21 wrote:

it needs some creativity put into the game 100 shops at home jam packed together buy basically all 99s its very boring. do not suggest this to anyone looking for something new its downloaded changed home and alot of messages about donatingâ€¦
